name: Battle Army
summary: Battle Army is a multiplayer FPS, giving players the ability to change the weapons and equipment of their characters. Immerse yourself in a nervous universe, aggressive and manageable at the same time. Run through many battlefields to fulfill the set objective, kill the enemies that will block your path and accomplish your mission. Two teams compete in different modes and varied. In constant evolution, the Battle Army game will propose new weapons, new costumes or new cards so that players of all levels can create unique and different characters.
